content:
I just found out that docs#LinearMap.restrictScalars is a coercion. Do we really want that? Is it useful?

I ask because docs#ContinuousLinearMap.restrictScalars is not a coercion, and it would make sense to me if these were unified one way or the other.
restrictScalars is confusing enough as is, I'd prefer no coercion here if possible.
I think right now we've compromised on restrictScalars having a coercion instance, but not being granted the rank of @[coe]
So at least there is no confusion induced by the infoview
No, it has @[coe], which is what surprised me.
I guess we didn't act on it that time after all
I would prefer to get rid of both the attribute and the coercion.
